flavorText: "We fight with valor in our hearts and fire in our veins!"
name: Embereth Skyblazer
originalText:
As long as it's your turn, Embereth Skyblazer has flying.
Whenever Embereth Skyblazer attacks, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, creatures you control get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of opponents you have.

rulings.text: While resolving Embereth Skyblazer's triggered ability, you can't pay {2}{R} multiple times to increase the bonus.
The value of X is determined only as Embereth Skyblazer's triggered ability resolves. It doesn't change later in the turn if opponents leave the game.
In a multiplayer game, opponents who have left the game before the ability resolves aren't counted by Embereth Skyblazer's triggered ability.
